thread.title: North man faces long list of charges following arrest for weapons, drugs - Lake County News-Sun
thread.title_full: North Chicago man faces long list of charges following arrest for weapons, drugs - Lake County News-Sun

author: Frank Abderholden
title: North man faces long list of charges following arrest for weapons, drugs - Lake County News-Sun
text:
A documented North Chicago street gang member is facing a long list of charges after he was found with a gun at a bar, prompting the Lake County Gang Task Force to obtain a search warrant for his apartment. There police found a cache of guns, including a semiautomatic machine gun, and drugs.
Willie Wise, 36, of the 2200 block of Green Bay Road, North Chicago was first encountered by detectives with the gang task force at a bar, also in the 2200 block of Green Bay Road, on Oct. 15. Police said he had a loaded .40-caliber handgun in his waistband and he was placed under arrest, according to a release from the Lake County sheriff's office.
Gang task force detectives and members of the Tactical Response Team executed a search warrant at Wise's home, and discovered seven firearms, including a loaded SKS rifle, a loaded AK-47 rifle, and a loaded Mac-10 submachine gun. Two of the recovered firearms were listed as stolen.
They also found large quantities of heroin, crack cocaine, and cannabis, all of which were packaged in a manner consistent for sale and distribution, said the sheriff's statement.
Elgin cops, FBI nab six in drug ring investigation Gloria Casas A 10-month drug investigation resulted in the arrest of six people on felony narcotics charges, Elgin police said Friday.
Elgin police's Special Investigations Division, the Federal Bureau of Investigation and the Kane County State's Attorney's Office conducted a joint investigation into a mid-level...
A 10-month drug investigation resulted in the arrest of six people on felony narcotics charges, Elgin police said Friday.
Elgin police's Special Investigations Division, the Federal Bureau of Investigation and the Kane County State's Attorney's Office conducted a joint investigation into a mid-level...
(Gloria Casas) Wise was charged with six counts of unlawful use of a weapon by a felon, two counts of unlawful possession of a controlled substance within a school zone, two counts of unlawful possession of a controlled substance, armed habitual criminal, unlawful possession of a controlled substance with the intent to deliver, unlawful use of a weapon street gang member. aggravated, aggravated unlawful use of a weapon, and unlawful possession of drug paraphernalia.
Wise is being held in the Lake County Jail and his bail is set at $500,000. He is scheduled to appear in Lake County Circuit Court Nov. 9.
According to Lake County Circuit Court records, Wise has a lengthy arrest record going back to 1998 for reckless homicide and aggravated DUI. The most recent arrest record is a drug charge from 2010.
The records list six criminal felonies, 12 traffic violations, a disorderly conduct, two family-related charges and two orders of protection.
In 2006, he was charged with a felon — in possession of a firearm — and aggravated unlawful use of a weapon.
